locations.name: Andasibe-Mantadia National Park
locations.description: Lush eastern rainforest famous for Indri lemurs and nocturnal wildlife viewing.

locations.name: Ranomafana National Park
locations.description: Dense cloud forest park known as a biodiversity hotspot, home to the golden bamboo lemur.

locations.name: Isalo National Park
locations.description: Spectacular sandstone massif landscape with canyons, oases, natural swimming pools, and ring-tailed lemurs.

locations.name: Ifaty
locations.description: Coastal region near the Mozambique Channel offering beaches, snorkelling, relaxation, and access to the unique spiny forest with baobabs.
